'''Doyle''' was [[Robert Martin|Robert Martin's]] assistant until he was fired.

==History==
Doyle came to the hospital when his boss, Robert Martin, was admitted. He stayed by Robert's bedside and tried to get him to follow the doctors' orders, but Robert ultimately fired him and sent him away, believing Doyle didn't respect him anymore after seeing him sick.

==Relationships==
===Professional===
He was Robert Martin's personal assistant for three years. When Doyle came to the hospital, he said Robert didn't have anyone else to be with him.

==Career==
He was [[Robert Martin|Robert Martin's]] personal assistant. Robert fired him while hospitalized, saying that once people see you as sick, they don't see anything else.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He'd been Robert Martin's assistant for three years.
